application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: CONARA Name: Liverpool Road Conservation Area

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

decision_conditions: Notwithstanding any details shown on the approved plans, this consent does not permit the installation of any plant including Air Source Heat Pumps. Such equipment may require a separate planning permission. Any equipment installed without planning permission is liable to enforcement action. If such equipment is required to achieve the necessary Carbon Reduction levels you should apply for planning permission for the plant, or alternatively explore alternative measures to achieve the necessary savings.Reason: To ensure satisfactory living conditions for neighbouring occupiers, and character and appearance of the surrounding area, in accordance with policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policy DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
description: Details required for Conditions 4 (Sustainability), Condition 5 (Landscaping), Condition 6 (Car Parking Provisions), Condition 8 (Boundary Walls and Fences), Condition 10 (Boundary Fences), Condition 13 (Secure Cycle Parking) of planning permission 16/13202/FUL (Erection of a terrace of 4 dwellings with associated car parking and landscaping on the main part of the site; and the erection of a replacement and enlarged office building following demolition of existing buildings)
